review: If you're looking for a way to save money on your TV program bills, here's your answer.  I purchased the Chromcast and installed it on our TV.  We followed the instructions given on the website and then signed up for a free trial of Netflix. Love it!  There is perfect clarity on the TV.  I highly recommend that you buy Chromcast if you have the USB port on your TV.  My first bill from my cable provider will pay for the cost of the Chromcast.  I was able to save about $100.00 per month!  Now I can watch what I want, when I want to and can pause if needed.  Stop wasting money on cable, Directv or Dish TV.
author: Georgia Peach "Joni Eareckson Tada fan"
